item.description:
Please join Eben Metevier of Kindled (a Northern New England Bioneers Conference being held in October of this year in Portland), our own Elaine McGillicuddy and myself on Friday July 11th for a preview video presentation about permaculture and the creation of Edible Perennial Ecosystems in our own backyards. The film is by Joe Burnett and features Elaine & Francis' permaculture conversion-in-process.

This is just one in a series of events leading up to this year's main Bioneers event designed to ignite human creativity and connections with nature and facilitate nature-based solutions to current problems.

This is not a potluck event, but will finish around 7:30pm for those that wish to carry on to another venue for refreshment, continued discussion and socializing!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Restoring Our Ecosystems - Short Film & Discussion at Portland Yoga Studio
